comment.body: @Krixano: I am using macOS as my main OS, wich is no where close to open source like linux, but after using the unix based terminal for some time, I can't let go. And everything on Windows seems harder for me. Git for example doesn't run natively on Windows.

Is this a mirror of the Github version, if not how up to date is it?
Will this replace the Github repository?
Tutorials and help about writing zeronet sites, are generally needed üëç
